en_comments: Pecan Nut (Food) is contained under DIN 00299979, along with several other non-pollens allergenic extracts.   In order to permanently discontinue the product, it cancels the DIN, which we do not want to do.  Arpan Maheta (ALK) has been in contact with Shavini Karunaratne from DIN Issuance unit waiting for direction on how to proceed with discontinuing the product without cancelling the DIN.
fr_comments: Pecan Nut (Food) is contained under DIN 00299979, along with several other non-pollens allergenic extracts.   In order to permanently discontinue the product, it cancels the DIN, which we do not want to do.  Arpan Maheta (ALK) has been in contact with Shavini Karunaratne from DIN Issuance unit waiting for direction on how to proceed with discontinuing the product without cancelling the DIN.
